name: Ghostship
overview: A stormy night in the near future. The cruise ship Y.T.S. has given out reports of strange craft overhead... Just hours later, all people on board disappear. A U.F.O. was later sighted. You are sent in on a solo mission to find out what the hell happened. You must locate the hidden Red Box which contains monitoring and surveillance information. Once found, HQ will send in a dingy for you. You may then destroy the ship. Beware of the onboard security.
